name: Your girlfriend bought your favorite cookie crisp cereal but forgot to get milk.
name_original: Your girlfriend bought your favorite cookie crisp cereal but forgot to get milk.
description:
A story with the theme of "Your girlfriend bought your favorite cookie crisp cereal but forgot to get milk". A game created for the Prose between Bros Podcast. Also checkout the podcast that commissioned this story graph: https://www.prosebetweebros.com.

From the Bros themselves:

This weeks prompt is "Your girlfriend bought your favorite cookie crisp cereal but forgot to get the milk."

One bro chooses his own adventure.   Carl and Carolyn have an argument. 

Send us your pages of prose based on the prompts we've used to prosebetweenbros@gmail.com.

Tweet to us @prosetweenbros with one sentence prompts for us to use on future episodes.

Checkout out at our website: www.prosebetweenbros.com
